column4: anyone here had success with connecting an ipod touch with Linux ... wife wants to buy one, but we only have ubuntu on our main machine and worried it won't work
personally I would go with something else, ipods are touchy from what I've seen
i think you are right ... i am not a big fan of Apple products
I have 3 'no name' players that all work with Amarok or I can just drag and drop files onto
